sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.AbstractScriptProcessor</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>AbstractScriptProcessor</name> <script><![CDATA[var AbstractScriptProcessor = Class.create();
AbstractScriptProcessor.prototype = { SYSPARM_ACTION : 'sysparm_action',
initialize : function(request, response, processor) { this.request = request; this.response = response; this.processor = processor; this.action = request.getParameter(this.SYSPARM_ACTION);
response.setHeader("Pragma", "no-store,no-cache"); // HTTP 1.0 response.setHeader("Cache-control", "no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate,max-age=-1"); // HTTP 1.1 response.setHeader("Expires", "0"); // prevents cache },
process : function() {},
type: "AbstractScriptProcessor" };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2008-09-22 12:27:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8a060ae7c0a80027000b70aecfd1f263</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AbstractScriptProcessor</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8a060ae7c0a80027000b70aecfd1f263</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-12-14 19:27:12</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>647</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
